          <title>
            <string language="en">Prisms as optical instruments</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prismen als optische Instrumente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Prismes en tant qu'instruments optiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Prismas como instrumentos óticos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prismi come strumenti ottici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρίσματα ως οπτικά όργανα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Prismas como instrumentos ópticos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This figure shows how prisms are used in a periscope (top) and in a binocular (bottom).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">prism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">periscope</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">total internal reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Prismen in einem 
Periscope (Oberseite) und in einem binokularem benutzt werden 
(Unterseite).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette figure montre comment des prismes sont 
utilisés dans un périscope (dessus) et dans un binoculaire (bas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta figura mostra como os prismas são usados em
um periscope (alto) e em um binocular (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa figura mostra come i prismi sono usati in 
un periscope (parte superiore) ed in un binoculare (parte inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο αριθμός επιδεικνύει πώς τα πρίσματα 
χρησιμοποιούνται σε ένα περισκόπιο (κορυφή) και σε έναν 
διοφθαλμικό (κατώτατο σημείο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta figura muestra cómo los prismas se utilizan
en un periscopio (tapa) y en un binocular (fondo).</string>
          </description>
